/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene scene of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high angle, providing a bird's eye view of the street. The street itself is lined with lush green trees and shrubs, adding a touch of nature to the urban setting. A sidewalk runs parallel to the street, inviting pedestrians for a leisurely stroll. On the left side of the street, a blue sign stands out, although the text on it is not visible in the image. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day. In the distance, the faint outline of mountains can be seen, adding depth and a sense of grandeur to the scene. The image does not contain any discernible text. The relative positions of the objects suggest a well-planned urban layout, with the trees and shrubs neatly lining the street and the sidewalk providing a safe passage for pedestrians. The image does not provide any information about the number of objects or their actions. The colors in the image are predominantly green from the trees and shrubs, blue from the sky, and gray from the street and sidewalk. The image does not contain any imaginary content and all descriptions are based on the visible content of the image.
